member.name: P:CslaEx.ApplicationContextEx.User
member.summary: Get or set the current $LS$$SL$$LE$IPrincipal$EL$ object representing the user's identity.
member.remarks: This is discussed in Chapter 5. When running under IIS the HttpContext.Current.User value is used, otherwise the current Thread.CurrentPrincipal value is used.
